Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: captainyellow
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv on black friday for cheep, but as for the tv, it is great, I have had it for almost a year with no problems, and the picture quality with hdmi is also great.

Reviews.Title: Very good TV for the price. picture quality is surprising
Reviews.Author: Lionel D. Vogt
Reviews.Content: Overall if you were lucky to get one of these during the black friday deals , it really is a spectacular TV for the price. While it does not have some of the adjustments and detail of the more expensive brands, Overall after some minor adjustments in the settings menu the HDMI performance is really very nice. Super light weight as well. The TV is actually made by Funai. One of the key things to getting the best picture is to turn off the ambient light sensor in the advanced settings, and turn the backlight to about 18 in the settings.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV for less than $300
Reviews.Author: Vinoth Selvaraj
Reviews.Content: I bought this during Black Friday sales in 2012 in walmart for less than $300.  I never heard of the 'Emerson' brand before. I was really hesitating to buy it and then decided to give a try thinking of returning it immediately if i did not like it. Now i have this TV for more than a year.After using this TV daily for a year, I am really happy that i bought this TV instead of spending more money on other costly brands.Pros:-----50 inch - price is  < $300.Picture is very sharp and clear.Surprisingly sound is very good than 40 inch Samsung LED TV my friend has.Has 4 HDMI inputs & 1 USB inputCons:-----TV remote looks cheap  --> But works fine so far so not an issue.TV is very heavy. Requires 2 persons to move. --> How often we are going to move a TV. so not an issue.5.1 Sound Bar:--------------This TV has Coaxial audio output. I bought a 'VIZIO S4251w-B4 5.1 Soundbar with Wireless Subwoofer and Satellite Speakers' recently. I was able to connect it to this TV directly using coaxial cable to get true 5.1 audio. It sounds much much better now.Summary:--------It was an awesome deal to get a 50inch TV for $300. Other reviews of this TV might say that it did not work/last long etc. you can see similar complaints in other costly TV brands as well. If you are not a tech savvy / do not have a lot of expectations from a TV, then go for it. You will not be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price!
Reviews.Author: Jeff "VisionaryUrbanTactics"
Reviews.Content: Scored this TV at Walmart a couple days ago during Black Friday. For the price, it is a great TV. The picture is just as crisp as my 120hz Panasonic. There is no lag or blurring in gaming or fast paced sports. If you are concerned about getting a 60hz TV because of these rumors, then rest assured, there is no reason to worry.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice!!!!!
Reviews.Author: april lang
Reviews.Content: I too purchased this on Black Friday of this year.  $288.00, cannot complain.  Very light weight, looks as good as my 46" Toshiba that I paid 3 times as much for.  Great picture quality, however some of the adjustment settings that I have with the Toshiba don't exist on this one, but really not noticeable.  GREAT TV for the price!!!!

Reviews.Title: I RECOMMEND IT!
Reviews.Author: Brady P.
Reviews.Content: Bought it on Black Friday for $288.00. What a steal! This TV is great for all uses. Even works alright for gaming!

Reviews.Title: Great 50 Inch LED TV for a great price
Reviews.Author: Mikey
Reviews.Content: I had bought a 39 inch Vizio for about 425 dollars including taxes, then I bought this Emerson for 288 plus taxes and am really very very happy with it. I kicked the Vizio out and am happy that I got a much bigger TV for much less money.

Reviews.Title: Sweet tv for price!
Reviews.Author: Andrew
Reviews.Content: Rad tv works great! great picture quality on ps4 with hdmi! For the price of the tv you cant complain..

Reviews.Title: Nice Television

Reviews.Content: nice televison for the price. i also have an emerson 40  inch lcd that has an amazing picture. got this on black friday for $288. wondering though when the tv is on and the screen is black for a moment i see a large with ghostly spot in the middle of the tv. does anybody else have this problem?

Reviews.Title: Every penny worth it!
Reviews.Author: Pocho
Reviews.Content: I bought this on Black Friday sale at Walmart at 8pm on thanksgiving for $288. Let me tell you how happy I'm with this purchase! It is pretty sharp and nice. Got really nice sound features. It also have pretty much all inputs you will need for all other devices.
